name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38433871

> [[ Crimson Guardians – Guild Hall ]]
> [[ Guild Leader: Liza ]]
> [[ Guild Officers: Kainzo, Mendicant, Florica ]]
> [[ “ Glory Is Forever ” ]]

You contemplate knocking.

You remember this place; lovely, somewhere between barracks and castle, with a red roof and numerous flags emblazoned with the crimson insignia. The district is quiet, so you elect to wait outside, watching the hall from a nearby alley It's at least a few minutes before anything happens: then, you see the doors open, and a crowd of people emerges. You recognize Andor, from the Disposable Heroes, mid-debate with a hooded woman who walks at his side. Behind, there's the Writ Keepers' officers; you see Ayla, Dorian, and another man, a pair of legionnaires from the Crimson Guardians bringing up the rear to escort them out.

What will you do?
> Write-in
